text.name: Do you want to add {0} as a friend?
To shop here you need to register first!
You cannot change while you are working!
1. Choose a tile\n2. Select area in your café while pressing the button on your mouse\n3. Then let go
Your new password must have more than 2 characters and your old password must be entered correctly!
A dish is being served from this counter. Do you want to keep the dish?
You can't reach your counter. Try and redecorate your café.
As long as there are other players working in your café, you can't customize it.
There are still other players in your café. Do you want to kick them out and switch to the customization menu?
Do you want to spice your dish with this fancy ingredient and earn {0} more XP and {1} more servings?
Season a dish with the needed fancy ingredient and you will earn up to 20% more XP and servings! Fancy ingredients also do not not take up any room in your fridge!
Your gift box is full! You can't receive any more gifts from your friends!
You can only change your password as a registered player!
You need to register first if you want to play Co-Ops!
You can only invite friends as a registered player.
Register to save your game score!
First, you need to help yourself...
Your invitation has been sent to {0}!
To invite a friend, enter their name and e-mail address.
1. Get food from the counter \n2. Bring it to the waiting customer
1. Get plate from the table (multiple plates possible) \n2. Take to counter
You must register first in order to be able to work.
Enter your e-mail address and we will send you your password.
You've used up all of your job permissions for today.
{0} (Level {1}) offered you a job. Do you want to accept it?
Show other players that you are looking for a job. If you have been busy already you can also fill up your job permissions here.
The player has worked enough for today.
The player has left the market place.
You don't have a fridge in your café. Check the customization menu and drag one into your café.
You need job permissions if you want to look for a job.
You have to read and accept the terms and conditions first! Confirm with the button on the left and off you go!
The e-mail address must not be empty or contain spaces.
Your password must not be empty or contain special characters.
You must register first in order to be able to work.
Do you really want to sell the item for {0} each?
Do you really want to sell the item for {0} each?
There still are some drinks in your Frosty! Serve them to your guests, then you can mix something new!
Your Frosty is not available. Why don't you try switching things up?
There still are some drinks in your Frosty! If you put it into storage, you will lose the remaining portions!
Do you really want to fire your loyal waitor?
Give your waiter a new name.
Your fridge is full! Sell ingredients to make room!
You can't reach your stove. Try and redecorate your café.
Get the ingredients delivered by the town's courier. Exclusivity has its price though.
You were kicked out of the café.
The cook needs to continue working!
We are starting a cooking class to perfect some of our dishes. Do you want to join?
Your family is coming over for Christmas and it's you who is has been chosen to prepare Christmas dinner. Enjoy!
A cake fight is planned and we need cakes! Please bake as many cakes as possible...
The town's soup kitchen is in desperate need of soups. Could you cook a few soups which really everyone likes?
For an Asian themed party we need a few typical Asian dishes. Do you know any recipes to make our evening?
The national builder conference is about to start and we need some really hefty meals. Do have something ready for real men?
Visitors from London are coming soon and wish to eat some proper meals from their home. Could you whip something up?
I am planning a party with a Mexican theme. I still need typical Mexican food for it. Can you help me out?
A sportclubs from Hamburg is visiting and I want them to feel as homey as possible. I need someone who can cook real Hanseatic food. Do you feel like it?
I am planning a garden party with many people. So I need a lot of food. I heard you are a true catering master. Can you help me?
The downtown ski park is having a huge Aprés ski party and needs a lot of tasty food. Could you help them out?
My boss is coming over this evening and I really want to impress him with a tasty four course meal... Can you take care of it?
There was a fire in the school canteen and the kids don't have anything to eat! Can you help us out and cook something tasty?
My best friend is having a huge birthday bash and forgot to order the food. A lot of people are going to come... Can you help us?
The village is having an Italian themed party. The only thing missing is the food. How are your cooking skills?
Meat and potatoes is what we like!
Hawaiian Toast for the garden roast!
Taking chocolate to the cheese mountain!
Mousse au chocolat at its best!
Bake pizza and co. for a birthday party!
You reached level {0} of this achievement! Congratulations!
You can now buy an additional counter.
New recipes have been unlocked for you:
You expanded your café! Now you've got more space for your guests, decorations and much more!
You can now buy an additional fridge.
One more instant cooking. One click and your dish is ready to be served.
Check it out! You can also expand your café to have more space for your guests!
This happened while you were away:
You've now got a new employee! Bring on the guests!
You can now buy an additional stove.
You can now hire an additional waiter.
Do you want to buy {0} tiles for {1}?
A dish is being served from this counter. What do you want to do with it?
A dish is being cooked on this stove. What do you want to do with it?
You haven't got enough money to extend this Co-Op!

Here you can fulfil cooking jobs together with your friends and earn extra XP and Cafédollars. The faster you finish the task, the higher your reward will be!
If you are running out of time you can always extend it!
But remember, you will only receive the reward if you make a contribution!
Do you want to extend the Co-Op time for {0} gold! Gold time: {1} hours Silver time: {2} hours Bronze time: {3} hours
You've already started a Co-op today! You can start another one tomorrow!
Do you really want to leave this Co-Op?
You have to cook the following:
There are no active Co-Ops at the moment. Why don't you start one!

If you drag your furniture and decorations into this panel and not onto the cash machine, they will be stored. You can reuse them by dragging them back into your café. This will not cost you anything. The number of items is visible on the red sticker attached to it.
Furniture and decorations have a luxury value. Summed up, this defines the luxury value of your café! How luxurious is your café?
Share some extra servings with your friends!
Every Mastery you earn makes your dishes better!
Do you want to spice this dish with {0}?
Start a Co-Op together with your friends!
You now have access to new decorational items!
Give your dishes some extra spice with fancy ingredients!
Discover the Frosty and quench the thirst of your guests!
Find new friends at the marketplace!
Try your luck with Muffin Man!
Visit other players via the ranking!
Hire a new waiter in order to be able to serve lots of guests!
Try your luck at the Wheel of Fortune!
You still need {0} network friends to help you expand your café!\nBut you can also assign a handyman for {1} gold!
You can send your network friends one gift per day.
You can send gifts to your friends from tomorrow onwards!
No gifts! You will receive new gifts with the login bonus!
You havn't received any gifts today. Send some to your friends, maybe they'll send you something back.
How do I cook a dish?
Use the stoves to prepare dishes for your guests. In order to do so, you need to select a recipe and cook it by clicking several times.
You will find an overview of all recipes and needed ingredients in the cookbook.
You will find the ingredients needed for your recipe in the ingredients shop.
When you have gathered all the ingredients, you can click on cook and prepare a dish.
A dish is ready after a pre-defined amount of time. You can put it on the counter in order to serve it.
A used stove is dirty and must be cleaned before the next use.
What do I need to know about ingredients?
This is where you store the ingredients you purchased. Every fridge has limited capacities. But it is always good to buy an inventory.
Fancy ingredients will add spice to your dishes. If you use them, you get more portions and XP. They also do not take up space in your fridge.
Some ingredients are unavailable sometimes. The courier can help you with this. For a small tip, you'll always have everything you need.
You get experience points by serving dishes. Other possibilities are: Waitressing in other cafes, the successful existence of Co-Ops, awards or serving drinks.

Your popularity decides how many guests visit you. Your popularity increase when guests leave your cafe satisfied. But it can also go down when guests are dissatisfied. Guests are satisfied when they get something to eat.
You earn Cafédollars by selling meals. Other options are: working as a server, successful Co-Ops or achievements.
Every item in the renovation menu has a luxury value. This will influence your popularity. The more luxurious the better...
You will find stoves, counters, tables and other items of furniture in the renovation menu. Get creative!
Should your cafe become too small, you have the option of expanding and making more room for your guests.
What else do I need to know?
You can get to know other players, look for work or just chat with other players at the marketplace.
You get achievements for all kinds of actions and they are also an additional source for XP and Cafédollars.
By using the marketplace, you can hire other players as waiters in your cafe or become a waiter for someone else yourself.
A Co-Op is a collective cooking project, which you can play with other players. There is a reward waiting in case of success.
Your waiters serve the finished dishes to your waiting customers and clean the dirty dishes off the tables as well.
Already cooked dishes that are not put on a counter in time will spoil.
Your fridge is empty! If you want to cook something you have to buy ingredients in the ingredients shop.
Do you want to apply Instant Cooking? Still {0} times possible!
Do you want to apply\n 'Instant Cooking'?
Hardworking waiters are rewarded generously! In addition to your tips, you've also gained experience.
Your waitor found a box with a mysterious ingredient!\n\nGive it to your friends!
One of your guests left you a huge tip! Give some of it to your friends!
Choose your bet. If you win you will get it doubled back!
Oh. You can't always win. Perhaps you want to try again?
You don't have enough Cafédollars/Gold to place this bet!
If you want to play for Gold you must have reached level 10!
You can play "find the filling" only if you are a registered player!
You can't sell your muffin baker!
You can only place one muffin baker in your café!
Very good! Which muffins hides the filling?
You can't bet that much! Your maximum bet is {0} Gold and {1} Cafédollars!
Yumm! You found the filling! Let's try again.
You haven't got enough Gold to change clothes!
You don't have enough Cafédollars to clean your stove.
Oops, you haven't got enough Cafédollars/Gold to buy this item!
Oops, you don't have enough Cafédollars/Gold to pay the courier!
You don't have enough Gold to do instant cooking.
You don't have enough Gold to hire a new waiter!
Another player got the reward before you!
You've perfected your {0}!\nGive some extra servings to your friends!
Your welcome present of {0} has been added to your account.
Simply click on the gold link in the e-mail and collect {0} gold!
Yes, send {0} Gold to my e-mail address now:
Your reward is in your gift box!
Do you want to save your dish?
Accept Terms and Conditions of Use
Click on the link in the e-mail in order to collect the gold.
Haven't gotten the e-mail yet? It can take a couple of minutes. If you can't find it in the spam folder either at that time, our support will gladly assist you.

Here you can mix drinks and serve them to your customers. Choose a drink and click "mix".
Just click on a "thirsty" customer before they take a seat to serve a drink. The "thirsty" customers are visualized by an icon hovering over their heads.
You have served all portions! Wait until the Frosty is empty in order to produce new drinks!
You have to purchase a Frosty in order to serve drinks!
You haven't got enough Cafédollars/Gold to mix this drink!
You haven't got any drinks left! Mix something new!
You can only place one Frosty in your cafè!
Give your waiter a new name:
You receive as a present: {0} Gold
You receive as a present: {0} Gold and 3 cool fancy ingredients.
Spin the Wheel of Fortune and win great prizes!
Had a spin on the Wheel of Fortune yet?
The first spin per day is for free!
Every further spin costs you one Gold!
You haven't got enough Gold to spin the Wheel of Fortune!
Only as a registered player you can spin the Wheel of Fortune!
You haven't got any space in your giftbox for your prizes!Make some space then you can spin the Wheel of Forntune!
Congratulations! Your price has already been rewarded!
Congratulations! You can find your price in your giftbox!
You won the pot of Gold!
Congratulations! You can find your price in your inventory!
The administrator has temporarily deactivated your chat function.
Your password has been changed successfully!
Sorry, but this is not your old password.
Your level is too low to join this Co-Op.\nYou need to unlock at least one recipe.
You can only join this Co-Op up to level {0}
Your storage is not big enough!
The ingredient is now available in the regular store. Take a quick look!
The courier is totally overwhelmed with work and can't deliver your items.

You can change your café in the customization menu only.

You can change your café in the customization menu only.

Private party! There is no room left for more.
You are already visiting this café!
Café is faulty. Please contact the Goodgame Studios support team.
Your café cannot be opened. Please contact the Goodgame Studios support team.

It wasn't possible to fire your waiter.
It wasn't possible to hire the new waiter.
The password you entered is not correct.

This guest is already being served!
Let's call it a day! Enough work for today!
You need to get a dish from the counter first.
Before you go cleaning up, serve the dish first or bring it back to the counter.
You can't use this name for your waiter.
New decorations to customize your café even more!
Get special rewards for your hard work!
Get extra XP, Cafédollars or Gold for your hard work!
Find out who else plays Café!
Find out who else plays Café!
Need more space for your customers or your decorations? Make room with the new expansions!
New and exciting Co-Ops for you and your friends!
What a delight! Enjoy your café now with sound!
Be a pie maker with the new pie bakery theme!
Meeeerry Christmas! Build your own Santa's workshop and enjoy the new and very merry Christmas decoration items!
The Christmas Spirit is here and brings you new Christmas dishes and new Co-Ops!
Boost your rating and make your café the finest in town using the luxury value of your furniture and decorations!
Get special rewards for your hard work!
Find out who else plays Café!
Make your dishes the best with the new Masteries!
Last chance for Christmas meals and Winter decorations!\nOnly one week left!
Amaze your customers with new and tasty dishes!
New achievements await you to help you become even more successful!
Cooking together is more fun! The new Co-Ops await you!
The Easter Bunny left something in your café!\nFind the new Easter decorations!
Never ever has poultry been so profitable! Discover the Duck à l'orange!
How lucky are you? Try your luck on the new Muffin baker!
How lucky are you? Spin the Wheel of Fortune on the Market place!
Boost your popularity with the new cotton candy machine! Available at the Wheel of Fortune!
TODAY ONLY! This is your last chance to spin the wheel and win the cotton candy machine!
From now on you can change your character's clothes at any time!
Meet and chat with other players!
More space in your fridge! Your fancy ingredients will no longer take up any space in your fridge. You can store as many as you like.
Starting immediately you can buy expansions using Cafédollars!
More space in your fridge! From now on, the fancy ingredients will no longer be included in the capacity of your fridge. You can store as many of them as you want.
From now on, you will receive expansions for free as long as you have enough friends.
Are your guests thirsty? Then get your own Frosty quickly and fresh them up!
Discover the omelette! The new and quick dish in your cookbook!
Earn extra Cafédollars and XP as a waiter in other cafés!
Tasty new recipies that will amaze your customers!
Meet and add new friends on the market place!
New diner decorations to customize your café more than ever!
Increase the income and XP of your dishes by using the new fancy ingredients!
Receive and send gifts to your friends within the new giftbox!
Increase the income and XP of your dishes by using the new fancy ingredients!
Bring on the cowboys and cowgirls and show off the new saloon items!
New breathtaking dishes that will amaze your customers!
Find out how you did in the newest rankings!
There is no I in team! Challenge yourself and friends with the NEW Co-Ops!
Get ready to scare the hell out of your guests with the new Halloween decorations!
Buy your Halloween decorations now! Limited time only!
Buy your Halloween decorations now! Limited time only!
Buy your Halloween decorations now! Limited time only!
Buy your Halloween decorations now! Limited time only!
Buy your Halloween decorations now! Limited time only!
Winter is coming to an end! Soon the winter decorations won't be available any longer!
Buy your Easter decorations! Available for limited time only!
I just installed Goodgame Café. Would you also like to open your own café and prepare delicious meals? Then come and have a look!

Goodgame Café is the brand new title from Goodgame Studios. Open your own café and amaze your many customers with your cooking skills. Hire your friends and shop for ingredients right now! Decide what’s on the menu today and grow your business. Your café will be the most popular meeting point in town!
To use this object, drag it into your café.
There are no further expansions available yet.
You have to reach level {0} to buy an additional counter. Or you can drag an old one in here to buy a new one.
You have to reach level {0} to buy an additional fridge. Or you can drag an old one in here to buy a new one.
At the moment you can't buy any more counters!
At the moment you can't buy any more fridges!
At the moment you can't buy any more stoves!
You have to reach level {0} to buy an additional stove. Or you can drag an old one in here to buy a new one.
You don't have any friends yet!
Right now you are alone here.
Soon you will be able to chat with other players in your café!
Welcome! Click onto the black board if you are looking for a job!
You need to register and reach level 1 to use the chat.

Hi %s!

I've just discovered this great online game "Goodgame Café".

This link takes you directly to the game:
http://www.goodgamestudios.com/cafe/

Register now at the link for free, to create your own café at "Goodgame Café".

Get to know what it is like to have your own café. Run your own business, cook great meals and see happy customers leave your café.

Enjoy the game and best regards, %s

Hi %s!

You are receiving this e-mail automatically because you have requested a new password.
Your password is: %s

This link takes you directly to the game:
http://www.goodgamestudios.com/cafe/

If you have questions or problems please write an e-mail to support@goodgamestudios.com

We hope you continue having fun with our game!

Your team at
Goodgamestudios.com

Hello,

thank you for your registration and welcome to "Goodgame Café".

You can login at any time with the following information:
E-Mail: %s
Password: %s

This link takes you directly to the game:
http://www.goodgamestudios.com/cafe/

If you have questions or problems please write an e-mail to support@goodgamestudios.com

We hope you'll enjoy Goodgame Café!

Your team at
Goodgamestudios.com

You need the previous expansion before you can buy the next one.
Only available at the Wheel of Fortune!
The '0' next to the small fridge indicates that there are no onions in your fridge. Below that you see the price. Buy one unit of onions!

Great! You won't have to wait long for your first guests to arrive.
Now you know the basics on how to run your café. Why don't you check out the rest on your own.

Have fun!
Let's get things started!\nShow the salad what you've got!
Here you find the needed ingredients, cooking time and benefits for each recipe.\nOh no! You are out of onions, but you can buy some.
Most important of all, the food. Let's make a garden salad. Click on the stove!
Use 'Instant cooking'.\nThis costs gold and comes in handy.
It usually takes about three minutes to prepare a garden salad. But we can speed things up, which we shall do right now.
Click on the stove a few times to go through the different preparation steps.
Well done!\nNow the dish only needs to be served.\nThe 10 servings won't last long, so make sure to make more food for your hungry customers!
Hello {0}, welcome to your new café!\nThis short introduction will help you enter the wonderful world of gastronomy.
The connection to the server failed. Please try to reconnect.

We are currently performing maintenance work, which is necessary from time to time. In order to bring in updates or new features or in order to correct mistakes.

We are working as fast as we can so you will be able to play again as soon as possible.
Why don't you try one of our other games in the meantime?

How do you like the game and what can we improve upon? Please, let us know your opinion in our Goodgame forums or group.
